sense.name: position
sense.commentary: standing or position on a scale
sense.examples: He gave Pizza Plus a rating of second best. On a scale of 1 to 10, Fido earned a rating of eleven for squirrel chasing.

sense.name: evaluation
sense.commentary: RATING[+event] act of ascertaining or fixing the value or worth of something
sense.examples: His rating of the local pizza shops took only two minutes. The rating of the children in terms of smelliness took Fido only 3 minutes.

sense.name: valuation
sense.commentary: evaluation - an appraisal of the value of something
sense.examples: He set a high rating on friendship.

sense.name: rank
sense.commentary: pay grade - rank in a military organization
sense.examples: Chris's rank was only that of flag officer.
